title: FS: McGraw, Chance, Chesbro in high grades with scarce backs
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: McGraw, Chance, Chesbro in high grades with scarce backs
posts.post_content:
Chesbro PSA 6..... SCap 150 ft. 25~ PSA Pop report shows only 3 of all grades! Impossible back to find, and it's well centered.....$1950,,,, Now $1795
McGraw(Port w/ cap) SGC 84..... SCap 350-460 ft. 42 OPrint~ Extremely tough back, card is centered with sharp corners.....$2150,,,, Now $1985(Below PSA SMR
McGraw (Portrait) PSA 7.....SCap 150 ft. 30~ Corners are 9's! Beautiful color with snow white borders.....$2350,,,,, Now $2200(Below PSA SMR)
Chance SGC 80....SCap 350 ft. 30~ A PSA 6 just sold for $1850 a couple of months ago, beautiful card that should be a 6.5......$1450,,,, Now $1325

PSA SMR prices have yet again increased dramatically especially for T206 HOFers......
PSA SMR prices for most HOfers in high grades increased tremendously in the last week.....
thought they were american beauties at first glance!  That'd have been sweet!!!
